segments.text: Honey , do you have a second ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure ! Are you okay ? You seem a bit worried.What ’ s on your mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ Ve been thinking , and well , I think we need to start seeing other people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? Why ? I mean , we ’ Ve had our ups and downs , and we have the occasional disagreement , but we ’ re happy together , aren ’ t we ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s just it , I ’ m not happy anymore , Tim . It ’ s not you , it ’ s me . I know that I can be hard to deal with , and you are a great guy ! You are the type of guythat any woman would kill for !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , what are you saying ? You ’ re breaking up with me because I ’ m perfect ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tim , you are too good for me . You deserve someone who can make you smile and make you happy the way that you made me happy . Oh , I could say that I ’ ll be all you need , but that would be a lie . I know I ’ d only hurt you , I know I ’ d only make you cry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Baby , come on . Don ’ t do this to me ! Whatever it is , we can work it out . Just give me another chance ! I know that we can get through this , but we gotta stick together ! Don ’ t leave me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can ’ t , Tim . I hope someday you can find some way to understand I ’ m only doing this for you . I don ’ t really wanna go but , deep in my heart I know this is the kindest thing to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here are your keys . I ’ ll send my sister to pick up the rest of my things next week . I ’ m sorry , Tim . I wish you all the best , and I hope that one day we can meet again . I ’ ll always love you . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1
